name: Baack to the Moon
description:
Hello there!

Baack to the Moon is a cute little Puzzle Game in which you rescue other sheep, make friends with them, and find your way back to your Family on the Moon!

This game was created within 7 days for the Brackeys 2021.1 Gamejam. More info to follow once Im not sleepy anymore.

(Things to Note: Crates dont really like to be pushed into another, and may occupy each others' spot. To fix this, if possible, try to push the inactive crate to another slot. Alternatively, use [R] to reset the level. Couldnt fix that in time for the Jam, sorry!)

____________________________________________________________________________

Controls

[Directional Keys] Move
[E] Interact with other (rescued) Sheep
[R] Reset Level/Section

Credits

[Code] Sebastian Bähring
[Sprites/Art & Music] Cindy Neugebauer (Twitter)
